divs: sighting detailsfor years i've not talked about this(these) event(s). in fact, after a long career in both military and government meteorology, as well as special upper air contract work on several islands composing the reagan test range in the marshal islands--these were related to a variety of army and nasa programs. i think someone might be interested in talking over several related ufo experiences i (possibly other career "weather-folk" as well) have had. most of them cover the time period within the boundaries of my caeer which spanned a period from 1956 through the present. if not, i'll travel my merry way, so to speak. sincerely, *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms).
trends: There have been no other sightings in Coraopolis
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Weather observer at Greater Pitt Airport--object approaching east end of main runway.
